dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, another billionaire just threw a few hundred million at the ocean? Are we supposed to, uh, get excited now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, another billionaire just threw a few hundred million at the ocean? Are we supposed to, uh, get excited now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, actually, A, it's $200 million, from Bloomberg Philanthropies and OceanX. Over five years. It's, um, a pretty ambitious collaboration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, actually, A, it's two hundred dollars million, from Bloomberg Philanthropies and OceanX. Over five years. It's, um, a pretty ambitious collaboration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Michael Bloomberg Bloomberg Philanthropies confirmed that it is committing $86 million over four years, and OceanX said it is pledging about $100 million over the same period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ambitious for them, maybe. What's it even supposed to do? Besides, you know, make them look like saviors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ambitious for them, maybe. What's it even supposed to do? Besides, you know, make them look like saviors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, it's about mitigating pollution, curbing unsustainable fishing, confronting climate change. They want to safeguard marine ecosystems.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, it's about mitigating pollution, curbing unsustainable fishing, confronting climate change. They want to safeguard marine ecosystems.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They aim to combat the impact of pollution, destructive fishing practices and climate change on the ocean, which makes up more than two-thirds of the Earths surface. Together, the organizations will support the exploration of threatened marine areas to advance scientific understanding, public awareness and education, advocacy and conservation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Safeguard marine ecosystems." Right. With $200 million. That's, uh, a drop in the literal ocean, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Safeguard marine ecosystems. Right. With two hundred dollars million. That's, uh, a drop in the literal ocean, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's not just the money. It's about fostering a deeper understanding between humanity and the ocean. Bloomberg and Ray Dalio are involved.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's not just the money. It's about fostering a deeper understanding between humanity and the ocean. Bloomberg and Ray Dalio are involved.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The partnership is based on the premise that there is a disconnect between humans and their relationship to the ocean, and that threats to the ocean are increasing... Bloomberg, UN special envoy for climate action and a former New York City mayor, and Dalio, founder of hedge fund firm Bridgewater Associates, made the announcement...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the hedge fund guy. Because they're the ones who truly understand ocean conservation. Makes total sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the hedge fund guy. Because they're the ones who truly understand ocean conservation. Makes total sense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's about their influence, though! They announced it at the 6th Annual Our Ocean Conference in the Maldives. That's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's about their influence, though! They announced it at the sixth Annual Our Ocean Conference in the Maldives. That's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The partnership was announced on Sunday Oct. 28 at the 5th Annual Our Ocean Conference in Indonesia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, how convenient. A fancy conference in paradise to talk about saving the ocean. Super relatable.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, how convenient. A fancy conference in paradise to talk about saving the ocean. Super relatable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But listen, three and a half billion people rely on the oceans. For sustenance, for livelihoods. This is, like, fundamental.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But listen, three and a half billion people rely on the oceans. For sustenance, for livelihoods. This is, like, fundamental.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than three billion people depend on the oceans for food and their livelihoods, Bloomberg said in a statement on Sunday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And this $200 million is going to fix that? All the livelihoods? All the food? Feels like a Band-Aid.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this two hundred dollars million is going to fix that? All the livelihoods? All the food? Feels like a Band-Aid.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're doing actual work, though! They just finished an expedition in the U.S. Northeast Canyons. Explored uncharted sectors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're doing actual work, though! They just finished an expedition in the U.S. Northeast Canyons. Explored uncharted sectors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...made the announcement at the conclusion of a recent joint project, an expedition to the U.S.s first national marine monument in the Atlantic Ocean, called the Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument. The expedition made on OceanXs vessel, the Alucia, explored parts of the underwater site that had never been visited by humans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Great. More pretty pictures for their annual report, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Great. More pretty pictures for their annual report, I guess.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's about science! Bloomberg said focusing on our own waters will, uh, resonate with Americans and people globally to do local initiatives.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's about science! Bloomberg said focusing on our own waters will, uh, resonate with Americans and people globally to do local initiatives.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By starting in our own backyard, we hope to inspire Americans and others around the world as they conserve their own national waters, Bloomberg said in a video on Sunday announcing the partnership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Local initiatives. So, it's a call to arms for us to clean up their mess, after they've, like, paid some money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Local initiatives. So, it's a call to arms for us to clean up their mess, after they've, like, paid some money.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, OceanX is even launching a parallel research initiative in the South China Sea. That's, uh, a really complex area.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, OceanX is even launching a parallel research initiative in the South China Sea. That's, uh, a really complex area.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A parallel initiative in contested waters. Uh huh. Sounds less like conservation and more likeâ€¦ strategic PR, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A parallel initiative in contested waters. Uh huh. Sounds less like conservation and more like... strategic P R, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's still more research, more awareness, A. It has to help. We need this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's still more research, more awareness, A. It has to help. We need this.
